Description: 9/15: This newly remodeled duplex Victorian 4BR/1.5BA has been gut renovated and is situated very close to the trolley, commuter rail, and various stores and restaurants/bars. Last stage elements are being completed. The unit has soaring ceilings, new appliances, granite counters, new walls and fresh paint, and freshly polished hardwood floors. Washer/dryer are in unit. There are gracious hallways and fine moldings.
